_header: For I am poor withouten friends
_description: A dead person speaks — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
ffor I ham pore withouten frendesIn gret pine among þe
                    fendisWirmis mete day & mithTo hard rekning I am dith
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 27.
